name: age\_group
description: subscript for parameters whose value depends on the age group of the person

name: date
description: subscript for parameters whose value depends on the date

name: federal region
description: subscript for parameters whose value depends on the federal region (Bundesland)

name: contact\_type
description: subscript for parameters whose value depends on the type of the contact

name: share\_of\_tests\_for\_symptomatics
description: share of PCR tests that is performed on individuals with Covid-19 symptoms

name: share\_requesting\_PCR\_confirmation
description: share of individuals with positive rapid test that seek a PCR test
